# snyk_integration (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "snyk_integration" "example" {
  orgid = "YOUR ORG ID"
  type  = "github"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `orgid` (String) Organization the integtion belongs to.
- `type` (String) Integration type

### Optional

- `id` (String) Integration ID
